name: @saekitominaga/htmlformcontrolelement-convert
description: Converting input value of form control.
author: Saeki Tominaga

scripts._build:compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/FormControlConvert.js -- brotlin compress dist/FormControlConvert.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/FormControlConvert.js -- terser dist/FormControlConvert.js -o dist/FormControlConvert.min.js -c ecma=2020 --mangle --ecma 2020 --module --source-map content='dist/FormControlConvert.js.map',filename='FormControlConvert.js',includeSources,url='FormControlConvert.min.js.map'
scripts._build:minify-compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/FormControlConvert.min.js -- brotlin compress dist/FormControlConvert.min.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify-declaration: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/FormControlConvert.d.ts -- cpy dist/FormControlConvert.d.ts dist --rename=FormControlConvert.min.d.ts
